channel.title: Testscape commands help
channel.description: I want to know how I could make ::update only work for one person and ::addxp work for all gold crowns can someone tell me how? also whats the max xp you can add to a skill using that command?

item.title: Testscape commands help
item.dc:creator: @o0x_vvv_x0o o0x vvv x0o
item.description:
@o0x_vvv_x0o wrote:

to make it by 1 person when u see like else if (command.update) and that u see like && playerrights > 2

change it 2

else if (command.update) && (playername"here".

look around in your client to do it the right way.

Read full topic

item.title: Testscape commands help
item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

hellou:

I want to know how I could make ::update only work for one person and ::addxp work for all gold crowns can someone tell me how? also whats the max xp you can add to a skill using that command?

Max xp 500000000 Update is only for admin at moment, and addxp working for gold crowns, just add thier names to the command.

Read full topic
